message.body: I'm meeting with Michael tomorrow about work. I may call you in the morning about that job you got if you need help. I'm ordering a respirator and filters tonight. It'll be around $30 for a set of filters and a 3m mask that accepts all kinds of readily available filters. Do you want me to order you one?

Yeah I'd love one! I can give you cash tmrw or next time I see you. Michael and I are going to check out that spot tmrw on 51st to do an estimate. He wanted to scoop it out before I made any final offers.
You want small, medium or large? I'm getting medium but I have no clue
